parameters.name: DataPlaneMode
parameters.description:
The data plane mode of the namespace. This parameter is valid only when the Ambient Mesh mode is enabled for the current Service Mesh (ASM) instance. Valid values:

*   ambient: sets the data plane mode of the namespace to the Ambient Mesh mode.
*   sidecar: sets the data plane mode of the namespace to the Sidecar mode.

parameters.name: EnableIstioInjection
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable Istio automatic sidecar injection.

parameters.name: EnableSidecarSetInjection
parameters.description: Specifies whether to enable automatic sidecar injection by using SidecarSet.

parameters.name: IstioRev
parameters.description: Specifies the version to be injected into the namespace. This parameter is valid only when the ASM instance performs a canary release. When IstioRev is not empty, you must not specify EnableIstioInjection and EnableSidecarSetInjection.

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The namespace for which you want to modify the sidecar injection setting.

parameters.name: ServiceMeshId
parameters.description: The ID of the ASM instance.
